fields.text: Welcome to 140 Proof in San Francisco, delivering the most precise way to advertise in mobile apps.
To launch or manage your advertising campaigns, press [INDEX].
To start a new campaign, press [INDEX].
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with a campaign specialist.

Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with a targeting expert.
For account support and other inquiries, press [INDEX].

For billing and invoice questions, press [INDEX].
